sentences.en: Again according to the Lexicon, Bill was born in 1970.
sentences.cn: 同样根据百科全书, 比尔生于1970年.

sentences.en: But they don't have to, as many English letters have become part of the local lexicon.
sentences.cn: 但他们也不一定非得知道, 因为很多字母词已成为汉语词汇中的一部分.

sentences.en: Chocolate equals sin in most people's lexicon.
sentences.cn: 巧克力在大多数人的字典里等同于罪恶。

sentences.en: Expanding your lexicon in this technical field will help you a great deal.
sentences.cn: 扩大你的技术领域的词汇量将对你帮助很大.

sentences.en: In my lexicon, those are not the same things at all.
sentences.cn: 但我认为这根本不能混为一谈.

sentences.en: In the Arab lexicon, the concept of justice means more than democracy.
sentences.cn: 在阿拉伯词典里，公正的概念比民主含义丰富的多。

sentences.en: Of or relating to lexicography or a lexicon.
sentences.cn: 属于或关于词典编纂法的.

sentences.en: Perhaps the least understood part of the voice application is the lexicon.
sentences.cn: 或许语音应用程序中您理解得最少的部件是词典。

sentences.en: Some fades quickly, but some becomes a part of the national lexicon.
sentences.cn: 其中一些俚语很快就被人们遗忘了, 但是有一些则最终会成为该语言的一部分.

sentences.en: The data were discussed in relation to theories of lexicon structure and lexical processing of children.
sentences.cn: 文章从心理词典结构和字词加工的角度探讨了这种差异的理论含义.

sentences.en: The dissertation is attemptable study on the lexicon of Notes on Book of Water.
sentences.cn: 对《水经注》词汇系统作全面研究将会对汉语史的研究有重要意义.

sentences.en: The Lexicon just is not one of them.
sentences.cn: 但是这本词典显然不是他们中的一员.

sentences.en: the lexicon of finance and economics
The organization of word knowledge in permanent memory is called the mental lexicon.
sentences.cn: 词汇知识在永久记忆中的组织被称为心理词汇.

sentences.en: This concept is not confined to lexicon ; it is also active on the level of discourse.
sentences.cn: 这一概念不局限于单词的层次上, 它还可以贯穿于语篇中.

sentences.en: This paper attempts to apply the mental lexicon to the compilation of thesaurus.
sentences.cn: 类义词典作为词典中的一种,是指将词汇按题材分类编纂而成的词典.

sentences.en: When translating, the translator plays an essential role in the determination of the TL mental lexicon.
sentences.cn: 摘要在翻译实践中, 译者对于目标语心理词汇的提取是至关重要的.

words.tran_cn: 词汇的；[语] 词典的；词典编纂的

trans.tran_en: all the words and phrases used in a language or that a particular person knows
